# <i class="fa-solid fa-map-location-dot"></i> Road Map
Here are the next steps of the project.

@ Handle HTTP GET POST DELETE PUT <i class="fa-solid fa-check"  ></i>

@ Create Error handlers <i class="fa-solid fa-check"  ></i>

@ Multi Part <i class="fa-solid fa-check"  ></i>

@ File upload <i class="fa-solid fa-check"  ></i>

@ Create logo <i class="fa-solid fa-check"  ></i>

@ Support to middelwares <i class="fa-solid fa-check"  ></i>

@ Create Documentation <i class="fa-solid fa-check"  ></i>

@ Support OpenApi

@ Update Errors to show better messages

@ Release v1.0.0

@ Create demon script to restart on changes

@ More Support to middelwares

@ Set cookies and headers wrapper

@ Create VsCode extension
